entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
